d0fb0058-8b7b-4523-9a5f-10def55df940.title: The Great Gatsby
d0fb0058-8b7b-4523-9a5f-10def55df940.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
d0fb0058-8b7b-4523-9a5f-10def55df940.description: The story of the mysteriously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan, of lavish parties on Long Island.

1230e8b9-dfd1-40ea-9b70-a027cd2d4f4e.title: The Hobbit
1230e8b9-dfd1-40ea-9b70-a027cd2d4f4e.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
1230e8b9-dfd1-40ea-9b70-a027cd2d4f4e.description: A fantasy novel and children’s book by J. R. R. Tolkien. It was published on 21 September 1937 to wide critical acclaim.

f18392f2-b86a-4ac8-b02a-dedbeacad33a.title: The Lord of the Rings
f18392f2-b86a-4ac8-b02a-dedbeacad33a.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
f18392f2-b86a-4ac8-b02a-dedbeacad33a.description: An epic high-fantasy novel written by English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien.

ffdc5cd9-c1f9-4823-a71a-bafa9589c4bf.text: An intriguing story with complex characters. Highly recommend it.!

c88abd34-46f1-42a1-9cb9-e2ce9bbd6058.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
c88abd34-46f1-42a1-9cb9-e2ce9bbd6058.author: J.K. Rowling
c88abd34-46f1-42a1-9cb9-e2ce9bbd6058.description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, introducing young Harry as he discovers his magical heritage and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
